types.Database: connection management with initialize(), createTables(), seedInitialData(), getConnection(), close()
types.EcommerceApp: main application class with middleware and route setup
types.Product: id, name, description, price, inventory_quantity, category_id, image_url, is_active
types.Category: id, name, parent_id, path for hierarchical organization
types.Cart: id, session_id, user_id, status, created_at, updated_at, expires_at
types.Order: id, userId, sessionId, orderNumber, status, shippingAddress, billingAddress, subtotal, shippingCost, taxAmount, totalAmount, paymentMethod, paymentStatus
types.CartItem: id, cart_id, product_id, quantity, price_snapshot, added_at
types.OrderItem: entity representing products within completed orders
types.ProductListResponse: products array, pagination object, totalPages number, hasNextPage boolean, hasPrevPage boolean, appliedFilters object, sortOptions object
types.ProductDetailResponse: id number, name string, description string, price number, originalPrice number, inventoryQuantory number, category object, images string[], attributes object, isActive boolean
types.CartSummary: items CartItem[], itemCount number, subtotal number, inventoryIssues object[]
types.ValidationReport: validItems array, flaggedItems array, totalIssues number
types.Session: session_id, user_id, created_at, last_activity, expires_at, max_lifetime
types.AuthResult: success boolean, userId number, sessionId string, errors string[]
types.CheckoutSession: id, sessionId, status, cartSnapshot, shippingAddress, billingAddress, priceTotal, createdAt, expiresAt
types.Address: fullName, addressLine1, addressLine2, city, state, postalCode, country, phoneNumber
types.OrderSummary: fields: items OrderItem[], subtotal number, shipping number, tax number, total number, shippingAddress Address, estimatedDelivery Date
types.CheckoutStatus: enum: started, address_collected, validated, processing, completed, expired
types.AppError: message, statusCode, code, details, timestamp, operational
types.ValidationError: extends AppError with field, value, constraint
types.InventoryError: extends AppError with productId, requested, available
types.TestDatabase: db connection, initialize method, seedTestData method, cleanup method
types.TestServer: app instance, database instance, start method, stop method, helper methods
types.ProductService: database connection, search methods, inventory management
types.ProductReview: id, product_id, user_id, rating, review_text, created_at, verified_purchase
types.ProductVariant: id, product_id, variant_type, variant_value, price_adjustment, inventory_quantity
types.OrderStatusHistory: id, order_id, status, timestamp, notes, updated_by

methods.initialize(): sets up database connection and creates tables
methods.createTables(): executes SQL DDL statements for schema creation
methods.seedInitialData(): populates database with sample product data
methods.setupRoutes(): mounts route handlers for API endpoints
methods.start(port): initializes database and starts HTTP server
methods.findByCategory(categoryId, options): finds products by category with pagination
methods.findWithFilters(options): searches products with filtering, pagination, and sorting
methods.findById(productId): retrieves single product with category information
methods.addItem(sessionId, productId, quantity): adds item to cart with inventory validation
methods.validateSession(sessionId): checks session validity and updates activity
methods.createSession(userId): generates new session for authenticated user
methods.startCheckout(sessionId) returns Checkou: creates checkout session with cart snapshot
methods.validateForCheckout(checkoutId) returns: performs final inventory and price validation
methods.confirmOrder(checkoutId, paymentMethod): creates order and processes payment atomically
methods.validateFormat(address) returns Validati: validates address format and required fields
methods.addToCart(req, res, next): handles add item to cart requests
methods.execute(operation, fallback): circuit breaker operation execution with fallback
methods.seedTestData(fixture): populates database with sample data for testing
methods.cleanup(): closes database connection and cleans up test resources
methods.start(): initializes test server with database and returns Express app
methods.stop(): shuts down test server and cleans up resources
methods.authenticateUser(email, password): logs in test user and returns session cookie
methods.addProductToCart(sessionCookie, productI: adds item to cart for testing
methods.updateReview(reviewId, userId, updates): modifies existing review with ownership validation
methods.moveToCart(sessionId, wishlistItemId, qu: transfers wishlist item to shopping cart
methods.get(key, fetchFunction, ttlMs): retrieves cached value or executes fetch function
methods.integrateWithOrderService(orderService): adds notification hooks to order processing
methods.startCheckout(sessionId): creates checkout session with cart snapshot

constants.SALT_ROUNDS: bcrypt cost factor for password hashing
constants.PAYMENT_FAILED: error code for payment processing failures
constants.ADDRESS_INVALID: error code for address validation failures
constants.SELECT FOR UPDATE: SQL locking mechanism for pessimistic concurrency control

terms.monolithic architecture: single deployable application containing all functionality
terms.inventory consistency: maintaining accurate stock levels across concurrent operations
terms.session persistence: maintaining user state across browser sessions
terms.transaction atomicity: ensuring all operations succeed or fail together
terms.price precision: accurate monetary calculations avoiding floating-point errors
terms.referential integrity: maintaining valid foreign key relationships between tables
terms.data constraints: database rules enforcing business logic and data validity
terms.entity relationships: connections between database tables through foreign keys
terms.N+1 queries: performance antipattern where related data requires multiple database queries
terms.cart state machine: defined states and transitions for cart lifecycle
terms.session-based authentication: server-side session storage with HTTP cookies
terms.password hashing: irreversible transformation using bcrypt with salt
terms.timing attack: security vulnerability exploiting response time differences
terms.bcrypt: adaptive password hashing function with configurable cost
terms.sliding expiration: session timeout that extends with user activity
terms.authentication middleware: Express middleware enforcing login requirements for protected routes
terms.checkout session isolation: separating checkout process from active cart to prevent interference
terms.payment authorization: reserving funds without charging the payment method
terms.order processing algorithm: step-by-step procedure for converting cart to confirmed order
terms.address validation: verifying shipping address format and deliverability
terms.session expiration: automatic cleanup of inactive checkout sessions
terms.race conditions: concurrent operations that can lead to inconsistent state
terms.price staleness: outdated pricing information between cart addition and checkout
terms.request-response architecture: client initiates operations by calling REST API endpoints
terms.layered interaction model: each tier communicates only with adjacent layers
terms.dependency injection patterns: components receive dependencies rather than creating them
terms.middleware pattern: session management resolved early in request lifecycle
terms.directed acyclic graph: component dependency structure without circular dependencies
terms.query delegation model: API layer focuses on HTTP while business components handle logic
terms.session-based state coordination: maintaining user state across HTTP requests
terms.eventual consistency patterns: optimistic updates with comprehensive validation at boundaries
terms.stateful session management: server-side session storage with security context
terms.security layering: multiple validation steps and cryptographic protections
terms.pessimistic locking patterns: preventing concurrent access during critical operations
terms.atomic state transitions: all operations succeed together or fail together
terms.ACID transaction principles: ensuring data consistency in multi-step operations
terms.Command Query Responsibility Segregation: separating read and write operation optimization
terms.envelope pattern: wrapping API responses in metadata objects
terms.compensating transactions: operations that undo partially completed business processes
terms.operational errors: expected errors with user-friendly handling vs programming errors
terms.exponential backoff: retry strategy with increasing delays between attempts
terms.unit testing: testing individual functions in isolation with mocked dependencies
terms.integration testing: testing component interactions with real database connections
terms.end-to-end testing: testing complete user workflows through browser automation
terms.test pyramid: testing strategy with many unit tests, fewer integration tests, fewest e2e tests
terms.test fixtures: sample data used consistently across tests
terms.mocking: replacing external dependencies with controlled test doubles
terms.stubbing: providing predefined responses for method calls during testing
terms.assertion: verification that actual test results match expected outcomes
terms.test isolation: ensuring tests don't interfere with each other
terms.test coverage: measuring how much code is exercised by test suite
terms.edge case testing: validating boundary conditions and unusual scenarios
terms.error condition testing: validating system behavior during failure scenarios
terms.security testing: validating protection against common attack vectors
terms.performance testing: validating response times and behavior under load
terms.concurrency testing: validating correct behavior with simultaneous operations
terms.test automation: running tests programmatically without manual intervention
terms.structured logging: consistent log format with correlation tracking
terms.correlation identifier: unique ID linking related log entries across components
terms.request tracing: following single request through multiple system layers
terms.performance profiling: measuring execution time and resource usage
terms.error correlation: linking error symptoms to root causes through logs
terms.query profiling: analyzing database query performance and optimization
terms.contextual logging: including relevant context information in log entries
terms.session inspection: examining session data structure and validity
terms.database profiling: monitoring query performance and optimization opportunities
terms.additive schema changes: database evolution through new tables and columns
terms.horizontal scaling: adding more servers to handle increased load
